span.style: font-family: Lato;
span.strong: Van Vleck ISD Resources During COVID-19 Closure

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-c5RTEf purZT-AhqUyc-c5RTEf pSzOP-AhqUyc-c5RTEf jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque

h3.div: In a great effort to be transparent and convenient during the COVID-19 School Closure, VVISD has now consolidated all resources into one site. This site includes resources for COVID-19, Online Education & Enrichment, Information Technology, and Health & Wellness (which includes: Health Services, Counseling Services, Food Services, Parent/Guardian Resources, Staff Resources, & Recursos en Español).

div.p: For questions or concerns, contact us at resources@vvisd.org.

small.em: Please navigate through the menu and tabs to find what you're looking for. If you can't find it, reach out!
(Mobile users; click the top left 3 horizontal lines to access the menu)

h3.div: NEW! myOn: The myOn Shared Account includes thousands of engaging digital books, for both online and offline reading. Many of these titles also have Accelerated Reader quizzes, and multiple students can read the same book at the same time.

span.strong: IMPORTANT 5TH GRADE ANNOUNCEMENTS (Incoming 6th grade students for the 2020-2021 School Year)

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.jsaction: click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

span.style: top: -11px
font-family: PT Sans;
font-family: PT Sans; font-size: 20px; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

em.strong: Please read carefully. If you have any questions, please reach out to Mrs. Perez or Mrs. Clakley. Thank you!

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 20px;

span.style: font-family: Merriweather; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Hello Future Band Parents!

p.style: margin-left: 20px; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Merriweather; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: My name is Melinda Perez and I am the Van Vleck ISD Assistant Band Director. I am excited to inform you that we are interested in having your student(s) join our band program! Rachel Clakley (our head band director) and I have been working diligently to get information out to you and your student(s) so that you guys can explore the opportunities that band presents, and so that you can further understand what band is all about.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 20px;

span.style: font-family: Merriweather; font-size: 15px; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 20px; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 20px;

span.style: font-family: Merriweather; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Here is a fun (and funny) video to tell you about band, introduce each instrument, and show you how the instruments sound.

span.style: font-family: Merriweather; text-decoration: underline;

p.style: margin-left: 20px; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 20px;

span.style: font-family: Merriweather; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: This video is from the Van Vleck Mighty Leopard Band Members and it is made especially for you and your student(s)!

span.style: font-family: Merriweather;
font-family: Merriweather; text-decoration: underline;

p.style: margin-left: 20px; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 20px;

span.style: font-family: Merriweather; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Here are some links (and more videos) to describe the benefits that music has on the brain and even on academic performance!

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Merriweather; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Merriweather; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 20px;

div.jsaction: click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

span.style: top: -11px
font-family: PT Sans;
font-family: PT Sans; font-size: 20px; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Merriweather; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: First, have your student watch the videos above (so that they know what each instrument sounds like)

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Merriweather; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Next, please click the link and fill out the form to tell us whether or not your student is interested in joining our band program.

span.style: font-family: Merriweather; text-decoration: underline;

a.strong: CLICK HERE TO FILL OUT THE FORM

span.style: text-decoration: underline;
font-family: Merriweather; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: This Google Form must be filled out by Monday May 11, 2020 if your student would like to participate in band!

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

li.p: Finally, for the percussion audition information (requires a video submission) please complete the following...

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Merriweather; text-decoration: underline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Merriweather; text-decoration: underline;

p.style: margin-left: 20px; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Merriweather; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Thank you for taking the time to read this message, watch the videos, and fill out the google form so that your student(s) can have the opportunity to be a part of our award-winning band program.

span.style: font-family: Merriweather; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: We are excited to greet your student(s) as they enter our band hall, discover themselves, and join our band family next year!

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 20px;

span.style: font-family: Merriweather; font-size: 15px; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Merriweather; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 20px; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 20px;

div.p: Melinda R. Perez, Assistant Band Director: mperez@vvisd.org

p.style: margin-left: 20px; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 20px;

div.p: Rachel Clakley , Head Band Director: rclakley@vvisd.org

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;
h3.div: 2. SCHEDULING INFORMATION: Please read carefully. If you have any questions, please reach out to Mrs. Weathers. Thank you!

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 20px;

span.style: font-family: Merriweather; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Guardians of incoming 6th grade students,

p.style: margin-left: 20px; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Merriweather; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Please click on the link below to fill out your student's Class Selection information for the upcoming 2020-2021 School Year.

span.style: font-family: Merriweather; font-size: 15px; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.em: Prior to filling out the form, please read and view the Band videos and information so as to make the best decision possible for your student

span.style: font-family: Merriweather; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: . For assistance with this form, or questions, please contact mweathers@vvisd.org .

span.style: font-family: Merriweather;
font-family: Merriweather; text-decoration: underline;

a.strong: CLICK HERE TO FILL OUT THE FORM!

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: center; text-indent: 0;
margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.p: On behalf of the staff at VVISD, we hope you are all healthy and making the best of the current situation. We miss our students!

p.style: margin-left: 0; padding-left: 0; text-indent: 0;

li.p: Parents, be sure to check out the resources through Region 3. Read more about what they have to offer by clicking here.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Merriweather; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Van Vleck ISD is committed to having a face-to-face graduation ceremony for the Class of 2020. Current protocol will not allow us to fulfill this commitment on our previously scheduled date of Thursday, May 21, 2020. Therefore, we are rescheduling our graduation ceremony to be held on Thursday, June 18, 2020 at 7:30 pm in Burl McKinney Stadium. Should restrictions that would not allow an event like graduation to occur still be in effect, an alternate plan will be communicated at that time.

span.style: font-family: Merriweather; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Please stay tuned to our website, and our social media pages for any updates. For immediate questions about graduation, please contact HS Principal Townsend at

span.style: font-family: Merriweather; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Merriweather; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

li.p: Learn more about wearing masks or facial coverings by clicking here.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

li.p: Students, check out the MOTIVATION tab to find unique ways to learn, be motivated & inspired.

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: center; text-indent: 0;
margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.p: Governor Greg Abbott announced on Friday, April 17, 2020 that all public and private schools in Texas are closed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year. Of course, this only means our facilities will remain closed. Van Vleck ISD remains committed to providing online learning support for the remainder of the scheduled school year. We will also continue to offer Grab-N-Go meals for all students at our two locations.

span.style: font-family: Merriweather;

p.style: margin-left: 0; padding-left: 0; text-indent: 0;

li.p: The Istation application must be downloaded prior to being able to sign on. Here's the link for instructions to download the app: https://www.istation.com/Support. You can also click on the Istation button located here. (It has been updated.)

p.style: margin-left: 0; padding-left: 0; text-indent: 0;

li.p: If you have checked out a school issued Chromebook, the Istation app should already be installed and you shouldn't have an issue signing in. If you do, please contact IT department via email at it@vvisd.org.

div.p: Health Services- Last Medication Pick-Up for the 2019-2020 school year will be held Friday, April 24th 2020 from 5-6 pm at the Elementary. The Nursing Team will be in contact with you if your student still has medications at the school that need to be picked up.
Students and Parents- Learn about foods that can help boost your immune system! & Don't forget about our MOTIVATION section! Find tips, strategies, encouragement, and inspiration.

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: center; text-indent: 0;

div.span: First, from ALL of us here at VVISD, we truly hope you had a blessed Easter! We miss you!

p.span: The Nursing team has put together some hygiene tips while social distancing, and the Counseling team has shared some new information on how to handle STRESS. Check it out! C

span.strong: CHROMEBOOK CHECKOUT - VAN VLECK ELEMENTARY PARKING LOT

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Merriweather; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: **Notes

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Merriweather; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: - If you indicated on our survey that you do not have Wifi/Access Hotspots, we will be checking them out as soon as we receive. We are waiting on our order that was placed last Monday, March 16, 2020. We will provide guidance.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Merriweather; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: - Our VVHS students all have issued chromebooks that they have taken home all year.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Merriweather; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: - If households do have their own devices, then VVISD's online available resources are accessible by laptop, ipad, smart phone, or other device.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Merriweather; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: - If your household does have Internet Access and not a device (laptop, ipad, smart phone, or other device), you are welcome to come and checkout, for each student, a chromebook on the following dates, times, and location:

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Merriweather; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: Friday, March 20, 2020 & Monday March 23, 2020 (Van Vleck Elementary Parking Lot)

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Merriweather; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Merriweather; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Merriweather; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: - Remain in your cars and we will deliver the chromebook through the passenger window.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Merriweather; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: - You will have to show a valid ID and your name must be present on the current registration form.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Merriweather; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: - We do not have cases, so we ask you to handle the chromebook with care.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Merriweather; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: - We will provide the chromebook and power cord.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Merriweather; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Merriweather; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: Wednesday, March 18, 2020 and will continue M-F 11:00am – 1:00pm

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Merriweather; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

span.style: font-family: Merriweather; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Beginning Monday, March 23, 2020, K-8 Mathematics and Literacy activity sheets will be included with the Grab-n-Go lunches. These activity sheets are not to be turned back into the school. Instead, they are for students to keep and assist them with skill building, as well as providing an opportunity for them to be engaged academically.

span.style: font-family: Merriweather; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: The district is not mailing home packets as the transferring of paper documents poses a risk for spreading the COVID-19 virus.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Merriweather; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Merriweather; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;
span.a: VVISD Update For Instruction During Covid-19 Closure

span.style: font-family: Merriweather; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Merriweather; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: In our greatest attempt to be as transparent as possible with you all, please navigate through the above referenced pdf document for further information and guidance regarding curriculum and instruction during the COVID-19 Closure.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Merriweather; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: The purpose of this document is to provide guidance and clarification regarding the following topics:

span.style: font-family: Merriweather; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: Attendance, Not Required Finished Products & Not Grading, Instruction Material and Resource Availability, VVISD Online Resources Education Enrichment Page & Survey, Accessing VVISD's Online Resources, Chromebook Checkout, At-Home Activity Sheets, Grab-n-go Lunches, Student Medication Pick-Up, Health & Wellness Resources, Students: Learn about the Coronavirus, Recommended Age Appropriate Schedules For Our Students, & Contact Information.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Merriweather; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: As Van Vleck Independent School District is closed in response to COVID-19, we are committed to continuing to support your students' learning. The district is offering these recommendations for students to engage in learning while they are away from school.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Merriweather; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: The recommended activities stated above do not take the place of regular classroom instruction; however, they can supplement student learning at home.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Merriweather; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: These activities are to provide optional opportunities for student learning while they are away from school.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Merriweather; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: We encourage our families to stay strong as we are all in this together.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Merriweather; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: #LeopardNation"

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: center; text-indent: 0;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Merriweather; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: This week is a transition time as we are making resources and virtual activities available. With the ever changing updates from the state and federal entities, we are carefully considering all of our options.

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: center; text-indent: 0;

div.jsaction: click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

font-family: PT Sans;

font-family: PT Sans; font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Merriweather; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: We need your help! Parents/Guardians...Please fill out online survey below. We want to be able to provide ALL of our students resources. Once the surveys are complete, we will have a better idea of what each household needs as well as what information and guidelines that our educators will be providing for our students and families. More information will be made available very soon.
